docs.lead_paragraph: TORONTO, Aug. 7. -- Calling "the color line" the problem of the present century. President J.W. Gregory of the Geographical Section of the British Association for the Advancement of Science made a prediction today of the development of the race problem in the United States in the next hundred years.

headline.main: COLORED FREE STATE HERE IS PREDICTED; British Scientist Looks Forward 100 Years to That Outcome of the Negro Problem.

docs.abstract: problem of "poor whites" discussed by J W Gregory in add to British Assn for the Advancement of Science at Toronto
